dcterms:description: A realistic, partially labeled Bitcoin temporal graph-based transaction dataset consisting of real entities belonging to licit (e.g., wallet, miners), illicit entities (e.g., scams, terrorist organizations, ransomware), and unknown transaction categories.
dcterms:title: Elliptic dataset
